AD_ArmoryWarningPaper_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ArmoryWarningPaper_0.text: *Let none transgress on this blessed day. Lord Gortash's ceremony will proceed without hindrance. Non-compliance will be punished.*

AD_ArmoryHeadHuntingPaper_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ArmoryHeadHuntingPaper_0.text: *To the Flaming Fist: A bonus of 10 Silver on successful recruitment of friends or acquaintances to our ranks.*

AD_AmoryWantedPoster03_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_AmoryWantedPoster03_0.text: *Wanted: 'The Stone Man' - leader of a dangerous criminal enterprise. Reported to travel with a mouse.*

AD_AmoryWantedPoster02_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_AmoryWantedPoster02_0.text: *Wanted: Party of adventurers with designs against the city. Armed and dangerous. Approach with caution.*

AD_GortashPoster_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_GortashPoster_0.text: *Lord Enver Gortash - handsome, noble, authoritative. He watches over the city, seeing everything.*
